name: 章韶洵
objective: This course "Introduction to Music" is intend to give an introductory survey on Western classical music. We will listen to and explore some important musical pieces of different periods from the medieval to the modern. Other topics include Chinese music and world music. Through this course, students will become familiar with the musical language and hopefully gain a lifelong interest in music as an art form.

week 1 Introduction
week 2 Music - an Art of Time 
week 3 Mid-Autumn Festival
week 4 National Day 
week 5 Orchestral Instruments 
week 6 Musical Form -1
week 7 Peking Opera
week 8 Musical Form - 2
week 9 Midterm Exam
week 10 Musical
week 11 Opera
week 12 Pipa Lecture
week 13 Concert
week 14 20th Century Music
week 15 Presentation 1
week 16 New Year
week 17 Presentation 2
week 18 Final exam week
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 20%
Final exam 20%
Final presentation 30%
Students are expected to attend a live concert of classical music and write a report 10%
Attendance and class participation 20%
